General.Name: Kulmbacher Brauerei Aktien-Gesellschaft
General.Description: Kulmbacher Brauerei Aktien-Gesellschaft engages in the brewery business in Germany. It supplies a range of Pilsner beers, specialty beers, mixed beer drinks, and non-alcoholic beers, as well as mineral water and soft drinks. The company was founded in 1846 and is based in Kulmbach, Germany.

0.Name: Mr. Markus  Stodden
0.Title: Chairman of the Management Board and Head of the Sales & Marketing Department
